thumb.title: 歩いてくる Be Frightened 【BGM】
thumb.description: この音楽は、聴く人を恐怖と緊張が渦巻く不気味な世界へと誘う暗いメロディーを展開します。心の奥にひそむ不安な感情がひょっこりと顔を出し、聴く人を不気味な旅へと導きます This music unfolds a dark melody that draws listeners into an eerie world swirling with fear and tension. Anxiety lurking deep within the heart suddenly rears its head, leading listeners on an eerie journey. https://twitter.com/nojisuman2525 download https://nojimusic.base.shop https://www.motionelements.com/ja/artists/nojisuma https://patreon.com/NojiSuma?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_link
